replies.body: It sounds like while you're able to connect to the match, a hardware issue is failing to render the game properly and stare at a blank screen.  Go over each step in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up.  Hopefully, you'll be back in game in no time!
